meanings.definition: In a straight line or lines.
meanings.sent1: She walked linearly along the path in the park.
meanings.sent2: The train tracks run linearly across the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the laser pointer linearly around the room.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts moved linearly from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The students lined up linearly for the school assembly.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is consistent and direct.
meanings.sent1: He followed the instructions linearly to assemble the furniture.
meanings.sent2: The project progressed linearly without any delays.
meanings.sent3: The comedian delivered his jokes linearly, one after the other.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed linearly towards the sea, unwavering in its path.
meanings.sent5: The athlete trained linearly, focusing on steady improvement.
